messages.subject: I too need help for spelling with a 14 year old...Possible Dyslexia?
messages.msgSnippet: I just started homeschooling my 14 year old daughter who is a great reader, great writer (content) but cannot spell to save her life.  Its really bothering
messages.messageBody:
I just started homeschooling my 14 year old daughter who is a great reader, great writer (content) but cannot spell to save her life. Its really bothering her.

I just read on Wikipedia that some people with dyslexia can read well but not spell well, have difficulty with math computation, difficulty knowing left from right, have balance and coordination issues, short term memory problems and poor personal organizational skills...Uhhh Thats my kid.

But what are some of the best ways to teach a child like this to learn to spell? Anyone know of any techniques? Programs? Anything? Thanks for you help.

Holly


Children are gifts that just keep giving



---------------------------------
Never miss a thing. Make Yahoo your homepage.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
